name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
"I don't raise pigs"
June 19, Cili County, Hunan
A woman said on the Internet that her mother died after being questioned at the police station on the 14th.
A reporter then called the police station to verify the situation. The police station staff answered irrelevantly, saying "Our pigs didn't give birth. I don't raise pigs." Then they hung up the phone.
Then the woman uploaded a video of snatching the body on Douyin.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Woman's self-report

name: 李老师不是你老师

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
According to the "Safe Cili" situation report:
On June 14, 2023, the criminal suspect Zhao Mouxiang (female, 56 years old, from Cili County) took the initiative to surrender to the Guanyinqiao Police Station of the Cili County Public Security Bureau for suspected crimes of harboring and introducing prostitution.
While waiting for interrogation, Zhao Mouxiang suddenly fell to the ground while going to the toilet. The police immediately contacted the hospital for rescue, and the hospital died after the rescue was ineffective.
The hospital diagnosed that malignant arrhythmia caused sudden cardiac death.
At present, the investigation and follow-up work are underway. If the investigation finds that the relevant personnel have violated discipline and law, they will be dealt with seriously in accordance with discipline and law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
@hanzhu74 @cc_aex @NeonChrisss @Yi_jiea Don't speculate. You can look at the hidden replies of each of my tweets to see how many advertising and pornographic tweets I have to block and hide. I can't block them all.
Look at other big tweeters and even the BBC, and they are all in the same situation.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 19, Jiang Feng, editor-in-chief of the Japan New Overseas Chinese News, posted a blog late at night, accusing China News Service (a bureau-level public institution under the jurisdiction of the Central United Front Work Department, referred to as China News Service) of accepting bribes and receiving gifts to select articles for publication.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Follow-up: Tens of thousands of comments were cleared

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
"A man in Taiyuan, Shanxi, played the role of a female kindergarten teacher and said he fed contraceptive pills to children"
On June 19, a news report about a "female kindergarten teacher feeding contraceptive pills to children" attracted public attention. In the picture, a user named "小难水" claimed to be a kindergarten teacher, corporal punishment and feeding contraceptive pills to a boy.
He also said "How can a man be innocent?" "Many kindergarten teachers do this, and we have a communication group."
On June 20, the police reported that "小难水" was a 30-year-old man from Taiyuan, Shanxi, who made the remarks to attract attention. He has been detained according to law.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 20, several Hebei University of Science and Technology students submitted a letter saying that it was rumored that a tutor at the school transferred the benefits of a student's graduation thesis and project to a client with connections, which led to the student's suicide on the 16th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Middle Finger Movement"
Recently, netizens have magically started a "middle finger movement" in the comment section of some positive videos on Douyin.
When all words, homophones, pinyin and even Emoji expressions are censored, people begin to use the most primitive way, using the middle finger selfie to express their dissatisfaction and being represented.

"I'm hungry"
On June 20, at Qinhuangdao Railway Station, a passenger attendant held up a banner in the station to demand his salary.
He was then taken away by his colleagues.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The netizen added that the man had previously been exposed for insulting a homosexual on the street.

"You are rebelling against me"
June 19, Xingtai, Hebei.
It is reported online that a migrant worker was beaten when he asked for his salary
The police said that the case is being handled and it is not convenient to disclose it.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen submission
Recently, a netizen reported that he is a teacher in Jimo, Qingdao, and has not received salary since February.
In the comment area, many people said that they also encountered the problem of unpaid wages.
Even someone around the contributor encountered the phenomenon of "suspending work with salary", that is, suspending salary but needing to continue working.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The article is too long, which causes loading problems.
After being divided into two parts, it should be able to read normally.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The second half of the article

content:
Netizen contribution
June 20, Dongyang, Zhejiang, Moore City.
Residents of unfinished buildings came to defend their rights after hearing that the local municipal party secretary would come to inspect the surrounding area today.
During the period, a policeman knelt down and begged everyone to stop making trouble.
According to the contributor, these residents have paid their loans for more than ten years, but the houses are unfinished and cannot be moved in, and no one cares.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
On June 20, it was reported that all 53 workers in the coal mine collapse accident in Alxa League, Inner Mongolia on February 22 were confirmed dead.
In the comment area, netizens criticized the media for only promoting "Panda Yaya's return to China" at the time, while no media paid attention to the mine accident.
